mosinstall.description:
SE Landing Page

Description

When visitors is referred to your site from a search engine, they are definitely looking for something specific - often they just roughly check the page they land on and then closes the window if what they are looking for isn’t there. Why not help them by showing them related posts to their search on your Joomla Site?

This module lets you do that, works with a long list of search engines!

Example

Do a search google for Socioword, and click the link to this site - you will be presented with a list of related posts right away

USAGE INSTRUCTIONS

  • Install the 'SE landing Page' as a standard joomla module.
  • Position the 'SE Landing page' to the most suitable position at the top portion of your Joomla Site, this is usually 'user1' position.
  • The title display should be set to 'no', this is because the module collapses once a link has been clicked on; however the title would still display.
  • Just publish the module
